meanings.definition: A plant of the daisy family with yellow flowers and hoof-shaped leaves.
meanings.sent1: The coltsfoot grew beautifully in the garden.
meanings.sent2: I picked a bouquet of coltsfoot for my mom.
meanings.sent3: The coltsfoot plant waved at me as I passed by.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a coltsfoot in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The coltsfoot leaves rustled in the gentle breeze.

meanings.definition: The dried leaves of the coltsfoot plant used in herbal medicine.
meanings.sent1: Grandma brewed a tea with coltsfoot for her cough.
meanings.sent2: The coltsfoot leaves were carefully dried for medicinal purposes.
meanings.sent3: The cat sneezed after sniffing the coltsfoot leaves.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of coltsfoot filled the room, soothing everyone.
meanings.sent5: The healer's hands worked wonders with coltsfoot and herbs.
